CustomField.description: The API name of the related SObject that this subscription is for (Example: "Account", or "Intake__c"). It could also represent a non-SObject, arbitrary, category (Example: "SalesActivity").. This helps to filter subscriptions better.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The API name of the related SObject that this subscription is for (Example: "Account", or "Intake__c"). It could also represent a non-SObject, arbitrary, category (Example: "SalesActivity").. This helps to filter subscriptions better.
CustomField.label: Event SObject Category
